meanings.definition: イッサカル族の人、またはイッサカル族に属するもの
meanings.english_definition: A member of the tribe of Issachar, one of the twelve tribes of Israel; pertaining to the tribe of Issachar.

examples.sentence: The Issacharites were known for their understanding of the times.
examples.translation: イッサカル族は時代を理解することで知られていた。

etymology.value: From the Hebrew יִשָּׂשכָר (Yissaskhar), meaning "there is recompense" or "he will bring a reward".

related_terms: Tribe of Issachar (イッサカル族)
